fields.label: Form Identifier
fields.description: Unique identifier for the form (e.g., 'corporate_training', 'perm_staffing', or form URL)

fields.label: Source Field
fields.description: Field name from the HTML form (e.g., 'email', '00N5g00000JKqLY')

fields.label: Target Lead Field
fields.options:
lead_name
first_name
last_name
email_id
phone
mobile_no
company_name
job_title
website
source
status
territoryindustry
request_type
market_segment
custom_vertical
custom_sub_vertical
custom_subservice
no_of_employees
custom_company_establishment_year
custom_turnover_in_inr
notes
custom_city
custom_state
fields.description: ERPNext Lead field to map to

fields.label: Is Required
fields.description: If checked, lead creation will fail if this field is missing

fields.label: Default Value
fields.description: Default value to use if source field is empty

fields.label: Transformation Type
fields.options:
None
Uppercase
Lowercase
Title Case
Trim
Remove Special Characters
Custom

fields.label: Custom Transformation Rule
fields.description: Python expression to transform the value (use 'value' as variable, e.g., 'value.replace("-", "")')
